sentences.english: It's a beautiful sunny day, you know.
sentences.chinese: 你知道，今天是个艳阳天。

sentences.english: It was a sunny day. I stood on a spacious balcony.
sentences.chinese: 一个艳阳天，我站在宽大的阳台上。

sentences.english: If there were no clouds, we should not enjoy the sun.
sentences.chinese: 如果没有云遮日，有谁喜爱艳阳天。

sentences.english: More than ninety-four percent of the winter days are sunny.
sentences.chinese: 攀枝花冬天94%以上的时间都是艳阳天。

sentences.english: I too was a boy in love with a pond, rich in sunny hours and summer days.
sentences.chinese: 我也曾是热爱湖塘的小男孩，拥有无数艳阳天和夏日。

sentences.english: Though memories have settled, unforgettable are those sunny days.
sentences.chinese: 记忆虽已沉淀，难忘记，那些艳阳天。

sentences.english: Like sunshine after storm were the peaceful weeks which followed.
sentences.chinese: 接下来几周恬静宁馨的日子犹如暴风雨过后的艳阳天。

sentences.english: For it is a pleasant day.
"…I was rich, if not in money, in sunny hours and summer days. "----- Henry David Thoreau.
sentences.chinese: 我虽然不富甲天下，却拥有无数个艳阳天和夏日。

sentences.english: “…I was rich, if not in money, in sunny hours and summer days.”----- Henry David Thoreau.
sentences.chinese: 我虽然不富甲天下，却拥有无数个艳阳天和夏日。

definition: moderate wind, beautiful sun (idiom); fine sunny weather, esp. in springtime
(idiom) sunlight shines over all things/drenched in sunlight
scenes of springtime/the radiance of spring/(fig.) a sight of sth sexy or erotic/an indication of a love affair
Chunri or Chunjih township in Pingtung County 屏東縣|屏东县[Ping2 dong1 Xian4], Taiwan
green willow and red flowers/all the colors of spring
sky clears after rain/new hopes after a disastrous period (idiom)/every cloud has a silver lining (idiom)/see also 雨過天青|雨过天青[yu3 guo4 tian1 qing1]
